TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IClientChannelSinkProvider

summary.span: 建立遠端訊息會流經的用戶端通道之用戶端通道接收。

span.span: Creates client channel sinks for the client channel through which remoting messages flow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道接收連線到透過實作的用戶端通道介面。Channel sinks are connected to a client channel through implementations of the interface. 所有遠端用戶端通道會都提供使用建構函式做為參數。All the remoting client channels provide constructors that take a as a parameter. 通道接收提供者會儲存在鏈結，而且使用者會負責將所有的通道接收提供者鏈結在一起，然後將傳遞到通道建構函式外部的其中一個。Channel sink providers are stored in a chain, and the user is responsible for chaining all channel sink providers together before passing the outer one to the channel constructor. 提供屬性，稱為針對此目的。 provides a property called for this purpose. 在組態檔中指定多個通道接收提供者，則指定的遠端執行功能基礎結構將它們鏈結在一起位於組態檔的順序。When multiple channel sink providers are specified in a configuration file, the remoting infrastructure will chain them together in the order they are found in the configuration file. 在建立通道時，將會建立通道接收提供者呼叫。The channel sink providers will be created when the channel is created during the call. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何實作這個介面。The following code example illustrates an implementation of this interface. [!code-cpp[Remoting_Sinks#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Sinks/CPP/clientsink.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_Sinks#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Sinks/CS/clientsink.cs#30)] 請參閱介面對應的用戶端接收實作的範例文件。See the interface documentation for an example of the corresponding client sink implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink CreateSink (System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSender channel, string url, object remoteChannelData);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink CreateSink(class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSender channel, string url, object remoteChannelData) cil managed
Public Function CreateSink (channel As IChannelSender, url As String, remoteChannelData As Object) As IClientChannelSink
public: System::Runtime::Remoting::Channels::IClientChannelSink ^ CreateSink(System::Runtime::Remoting::Channels::IChannelSender ^ channel, System::String ^ url, System::Object ^ remoteChannelData);

param.name: channel
param.span: 正在用來建構目前接收鏈結的通道。

span.span: Channel for which the current sink chain is being constructed.

param.name: url

span.span: The URL of the object to connect to.

param.span: 如果連接完全根據包含在 remoteChannelData 參數中的資訊，則這個參數可以是 。

span.span: This parameter can be if the connection is based entirely on the information contained in the remoteChannelData parameter.

param.name: remoteChannelData
param.span: 通道資料物件，其描述遠端伺服器上的通道。

span.span: A channel data object that describes a channel on the remote server.

returns.span: 新建構的通道接收鏈結的第一個接收，或 ，表示這個提供者將不會或無法提供這個端點的連接。

span.span: The first sink of the newly formed channel sink chain, or , which indicates that this provider will not or cannot provide a connection for this endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當呼叫方法時，它會建立自己的通道接收，轉送呼叫鏈結 （如果有的話） 中的下一步 接收提供者，並確保下一步 接收與目前已連結在一起。When the method is called, it creates its own channel sink, forwards the call to the next sink provider in the chain (if there is one), and ensures that the next sink and the current one are linked together. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將說明此方法的實作。The following code example illustrates an implementation of this method. [!code-cpp[Remoting_Sinks#33](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Sinks/CPP/clientsink.cpp#33)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_Sinks#33](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Sinks/CS/clientsink.cs#33)]

exception.span: 立即呼叫端沒有基礎結構使用權限。

span.span: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.

permission.span: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Runtime::Remoting::Channels::IClientChannelSinkProvider ^ Next { System::Runtime::Remoting::Channels::IClientChannelSinkProvider ^ get(); void set(System::Runtime::Remoting::Channels::IClientChannelSinkProvider ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定通道接收提供者鏈結中的下一個接收提供者。

span.span: Gets or sets the next sink provider in the channel sink provider chain.

value.span: 通道接收提供者鏈結中的下一個接收提供者。

span.span: The next sink provider in the channel sink provider chain.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明這個屬性的實作。The following code example illustrates an implementation of this property. [!code-cpp[Remoting_Sinks#32](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Sinks/CPP/clientsink.cpp#32)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_Sinks#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Sinks/CS/clientsink.cs#32)]

exception.span: 立即呼叫端沒有基礎結構使用權限。

span.span: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.

permission.span: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。
